question: What is your return policy?
answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all items. Items must be in original condition with tags attached. Returns are processed within 5-7 business days of receipt.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: To return an item, log into your account, go to 'My Orders', select the item you want to return, and follow the return process. You'll receive a prepaid return label via email.

question: Can I return items without a receipt?
answer: Returns without receipt are accepted within 30 days with valid ID. Refund will be issued as store credit at the lowest selling price in the last 90 days.

question: What items cannot be returned?
answer: Personalized items, final sale items, intimate apparel, and items used or damaged by customer cannot be returned. Gift cards are also non-returnable.

question: How long does a return take to process?
answer: Returns are processed within 5-7 business days of receipt at our warehouse. Refunds appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days after processing.

question: What shipping options do you offer?
answer: We offer standard shipping (5-7 days), expedited shipping (2-3 days), and overnight shipping. Free standard shipping on orders over $50.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping takes 7-14 business days. Customs fees may apply.

question: Can I change my shipping address?
answer: Shipping address can be changed within 2 hours of placing the order. After that, please contact customer service for assistance.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and gift cards.

question: Is my payment information secure?
answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption and PCI DSS compliant payment processing. Your payment information is never stored on our servers.

question: Can I use multiple payment methods for one order?
answer: Currently, we only accept one payment method per order. You can use gift cards in combination with one other payment method.

question: How do I contact customer service?
answer: You can contact us via phone at 1-800-CUSTOMER (Mon-Fri 9AM-8PM EST), email at support@company.com, or live chat on our website.

question: What are your business hours?
answer: Our customer service is available Monday-Friday 9AM-8PM EST, Saturday 10AM-6PM EST. Our website is available 24/7 for online orders.

question: Do you have a size guide?
answer: Yes, each product page includes a detailed size guide. You can also find our general size chart in the footer under 'Size Guide'.

question: What if an item is out of stock?
answer: If an item is out of stock, you can sign up for restock notifications. We'll email you when the item becomes available again.
